DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of NON-7746 in healthy adult subjects. The secondary objectives are to characterize the pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic profiles of ONO-7746 and to evaluate the food effect on the PK profile of ONO-7746 when administered with or without a meal.
DOC.brief_title: ONO-7746 Study in Healthy Adult Subject
DOC.criteria: Healthy nonsmoking male or female subjects (1855 inclusive) Body mass index (BMI) of 1935 kg/m2 (inclusive) For females, postmenopausal, nonlactating, and nonpregnant History or presence of clinically significant disease
